testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Verify multiple interactive elements exist (buttons, forms, links)
Verify application has real features, not just 'Vite + React' text
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional features and interactivity
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: UI Components Test
testCases.description: Test that UI components are properly implemented
steps: Check for buttons and verify they're clickable
Look for forms and input fields
testCases.expectedOutcome: Multiple interactive UI components found and functional

testCases.name: Content Quality Test
steps: Check page has substantial content beyond placeholder
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application demonstrates real functionality and professional design

testCases.name: User Authentication Test
steps: Check that user is redirected to dashboard
Verify user information is properly stored
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can successfully authenticate and access protected routes

testCases.name: Property Search Test
steps: Use search form to look for properties
Check that property details are accessible
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can search for properties and view results

testCases.name: Booking Workflow Test
testCases.description: Verify the booking workflow for travelers
steps: Verify booking appears in user dashboard
testCases.expectedOutcome: Guest users can successfully request bookings

testCases.name: Host Management Test
testCases.description: Verify property management functionality for hosts
testCases.expectedOutcome: Host users can manage their property listings

testCases.name: Messaging Test
testCases.description: Verify messaging functionality between guests and hosts
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can communicate through the messaging system
